slider.multiAssetsManagementDescription: Integrated digital asset management with bulk upload, fast preview, automatic metadata extraction, and full control over the archive and file history.
slider.SmartSearchAndAdvancedContentDescription: Accurate and intelligent asset search by combining textual and structural filters, along with audio-, image-, and video-based search for fast access to relevant content in Vidara.
slider.IntelligentContentProcessingDescription: Intelligent processing of audio and video assets, including transcription, summarization, automatic and manual tagging, content conversion and extraction, with full process monitoring and management of processed outputs.
slider.TeamInteractionAndCollaboration: Team interaction and collaboration on content through comments and frame-level annotations, version management, and task assignment within the Vidara workspace.
slider.FastAndMultiChannelPublishing: Fast and multi-channel content publishing through a dedicated brand portal, link or social media sharing, and publication status management with reporting.
slider.SearchAndQuickAccessToContent: Search and quick access to content
